answerText: dimethyl sulfoxide (accept DMSO)[10] Another useful solvent is DMF, an amide derivative of this simplest carboxylic acid. It is named for its natural occurrence in ants' venom.

subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this organosulfur polar solvent that stains your skin and is used in the Swern oxidation.
